resources.string:
This app is build for Learning purpose. You can use this app for your any need.
 Git Repository Link-
https://gitlab.com/TheHasnatBD/browserApp


University Project
BANGLADESH UNIVERSITY

Course Name:
Software Engineering

☐ This is a simple Web Browser. User can input their URL in input area. He can browse smoothly using this browser with smart progressbar in url loading.
 	☐ Here has a Home button and 2 buttons for previous & forward browsing web page (if available those types of web page)
 	☐ It has a feature that on back button pressing. This Browser detects if has any previous web pages, if there has no pages it warn's user to exit this app. By double clicking back pressing within 1.5 second app will be exit.
 	☐ This app has also Splash Screen/ Welcome Screen For better user Interface.
 	☐ It has more interactive Intro Screen with SharedPreference, helpful for new developers.
 	☐ It has an attractive feature that is cookies handling. It saves cookies for interactive browsing.
 	☐ This app is connected with Firebase Analytics, for real time user, user activity, user location, apps bug reports etc
(More features will be added in upcoming version. Stay connected with this git repository for next update.) \n
Easy browsing functionality are applied for general users
Superb fast browsing speed you get by using browser
All update will\'be get through the browser
